name: Paleontologist Simulator
description:
This game was made for SA Game Jam 2021. The team was Maike Watson (@lil_miss_beats), Sabrina Becker (@sabrina_una_becker) and Jonathan Hau-Yoon (@elyaradine).

FOSSIL CONTROLS:

  • While holding a fossil, [Right Mouse Button] to rotate it.
  • Click on a connected fossil with RMB to disconnect it.
  • It's... pretty buggy... :P

Plugins used:

  • DOTween by Demigiant
  • Framework and Sound Manager by Robbie Fraser
